data.name: Seven Cities
data.detailed_description:
Seven Cities is an Action RPG which combine the gamecore of Hack'n Slash genre with an urban modern world. Travel through a divided New York full of intrigue and dangers in which you will be pushed to find your place in this universe and will try to unite the new districts of New York. Take the challenge and take part in this adventure by joining the Seven Cities !

Main Features



SEVEN CITIES, SEVEN DIFFERENT BIOMES
2030, scientists and military set up an IA called PSI, to stop the impending global crisis. New York City, PSI's test city, finds itself at the heart of an increasingly divided conservative America. From this division, the seven districts called Cities are born, each holding a part of the components used to make this AI work. Search these components called CEROMS to relaunch the test program and to revive the hope of the unification of the peoples.


OUTSIDER, YOUR TIME IS NOW
The world didn't wait you to come. Each of the Seven Cities defends its own interests and in this climate of extreme tension, you find yourself propelled in spite of yourself in this travel. As an Outsider, you will have to convince them to join your cause to keep the hope of reuniting New York City.


THE MORE THE MERRIER
Throughout your journey you will be accompagnied by your robotic companion.
As a real, usefull, companion (for once). He will benefit from :

  • Its own actives and passives skills
  • Its own stats
  • Five different evolving forms to five unique classes
  • Its own item set and a hundred unlockable skins !


WHAT'S YOUR AFFINITY ?
Seven Cities establish a tailored gameplay which allows players to play in their own way with many possibility of specilization. Equip yourself with a huge possibility of assault rifles, shotguns, submachine guns, use your special attacks and fight along of you robotic companion. For each weapon and special attack, you will unlock five level of personnalization according to your way of fighting. Your gameplay will define your own class !

data.short_description: Seven Cities is an Action-RPG which takes place in an urban contemporary world. A near-futur New York full of intrigue. You play as an Outsider along with a robotic companion. Both will evolve through many intensive fights to find the 7 CEROM's

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060 or AMD R9 270 with 2+ GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060 or AMD RX 480 with 4+ GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content
